label: InformationRecieve
info:
This flow read information from the sensor node.

The information is recieved in different topics as follows:

- Sensor recieves the information from DH11 and the light sensor.
- Device recieves the information from the board and the wifi module.
- Status recieves the retained message with the state of the node (online/offline).

label: InformationStorage
info:
This flow storages the info recieved by the
different sensors in mongoDB.

label: InformationConsult
info:
This allows to consult the mongoDB database using
a User Interface for different functionalities.

name: Update info
info:
Every time that a value is changed,
the list of information displayed is updated.

There is also the possibility to update it
manually with a the dashboard and a cyclic
update when a new value is added.

name: Enable option

Firmware Upgrade
info:
The system determines which firmware to send based
on the MAC address, version, and MD5 headers in the
request from the ESP8266.

Firstly, it checks if a firmware hash file with 
the MAC address as the name exists, or else if a 
firmware file with the version as the name exists.
If neither exist then no update is available.

It then reads the corresponding MD5 hash from the
hash file and compares to the MD5 hash in the
request.  If they match then the firmware is up
to date and no update is required.

Otherwise, it sends the contents of the firmware
bin file and the MD5 hash value.
